title: Ep. 11 - Holiday survival tips for the menopausal woman
itunes:title: Ep. 11 - Holiday survival tips for the menopausal woman
description: December is overwhelming and nobody’s helped when we become short-tempered and sweaty. So we can head this off by... indulging in every whim. Well. Maybe not every whim. But most of them? Wendy offers her twist on all the things we’re told to do.
content:encoded: December is overwhelming and nobody’s helped when we become short-tempered and sweaty. So we can head this off by... indulging in every whim. Well. Maybe not every whim. But most of them? Wendy offers her twist on all the things we’re told to do.
